titleStmt.title: Despatch from Judson A. Lewis to John Hay, May 17, 1880

bibl.title: Despatch from Judson A. Lewis to John Hay
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p:
U.S. Consulate at Sierra Leone
34 Smith St Brooklyn N.Y.
J A Lewis to Dept State
Transmitting Quarterly Returns for Quarter Ending March 31st 1880.

34 Smith St
Brooklyn New York
May 17th 1880.

Hon John Hay
Asst Secty of State

I forward herewith the Quarterly Consular Returns (Sierra Leone Consulate) for Quarter Ending March 31st 1880. Proper returns also forwarded 5th Auditor this day. Not having time to forward the same by Mail from Sierra Leone I brought them with me & forward them from this place.

Trusting all will be satisfactory
I remain Your
Obedient Servant
Judson A. Lewis
U S Consul
